content: llllllllaaaaaaaavvvvvvvvaaaaaaaa fffffffflllllllloooooooowwwwwwww yarn mirasol k acha notes and stitch patterns 60% merino 25% alpaca 15% silk 98 yards per 50g cable row slip 12 sts to cable needle and hold to front of ball 3 balls required though work k2 p2 3 times k2 p2 3 times from cable needle you will only use a little of k2 p2 6 times the third ball st s stitch es needles & 5 0 mm us 8 needles k knit notions waste yarn and crochet p purl hook for provisional cast-on cable needle although you may prefer to use a double- pointed needle gauge roughly 4 5 sts/inch size one size will fit most adults instructions using crochet hook and waste yarn crochet a chain at least 50 sts long pick up and knit 48 sts from the bumps on the back of the crochet chain row 1-10 k2 p2 12 times row 11 cable row row 12-21 k2 p2 12 times work row 1-21 9 times if you decide to change the length of the cowl it s important that you work an odd number of repeats as the cables will not flow together with an even number of repeats block the cowl flat stretching out the ribs once dry unpick the provisional cast-on and place all sts on a spare needle for grafting match up the ends of the work then turn one end over the last stitch on the right will meet the first stitch on the left of the opposite side this forms the möbius strip graft the ends together making the ribs match as much as possible weave in ends and enjoy any problems with the pattern don t hesitate to message me on ravelry username timiat © dixie 2010
